message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to take it off your hands for $95.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking to get a little closer to my asking price. How about we meet in the middle at $102?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $102 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $98.  This is my final offer before I look at other options. What do you say?
